snippet: The setup man David Robertson hurt his right foot in a stair accident at his Tampa, Fla., home and underwent imaging tests to diagnose the problem.
abstract: New York Yankees are hoping foot injury sustained by relief pitcher David Robertson is only a sprain.
lead_paragraph: The setup man David Robertson hurt his right foot in a stair accident at his Tampa, Fla., home and underwent imaging tests to diagnose the problem.

headline.seo: David Robertson, Yankees Reliever, Hurts Foot at Home
headline.main: Yankees Hope Reliever’s Foot Injury Is Just a Sprain
headline.print_headline: Yankees Hope Reliever’s Foot Injury Is Just a Sprain
